title: Add Google Ads tracking tag to website

acceptanceCriteria: The Google Ads tracking script is present in frontend/index.html within the <head> section
The script includes the async gtag.js loader with ID AW-17968689708
The dataLayer initialization and gtag config code is included
The tracking code loads on all pages of the website
The script is placed before the closing </head> tag to ensure proper initialization timing

constraints: Do not modify the existing Google Search Console verification meta tag already present in frontend/index.html
Preserve all existing meta tags and scripts in the <head> section
The tracking script must use the exact Google Ads ID provided: AW-17968689708
nonGoals: Setting up Google Ads conversion events or custom tracking beyond the base installation
Implementing Google Tag Manager instead of direct gtag.js integration
Adding privacy consent management for the tracking script
